metadata.name: 45 SPF High Protection Uva Uvb Cream Liquid

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Applied topically to filter out UVA rays

contraindications.disease: The most common reactions were dermatitis dry skin acne itching redness and skin discomfort
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: When exposed to UV ecamsule undergoes reversible photoisomerization followed by photoexcitation The absorbed UV is then released as thermal energy without penetrating the skin thereby protecting the skin from UV exposure
